name: detroiter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US city of Detroit: It's so nice to meet another Detroiter! The restaurant was popular among young Detroiters.
More examplesFewer examplesSome Detroiters would prefer to see vacant land used for small community gardens.The firm was committed to creating a staff predominantly made up of local Detroiters.In 1950, 16 percent of Detroiters were Black.She is a former Detroiter who has lived in Sydney for 20 years, where she is a performance artist.
